rules_text:
Third Act [i](If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Return each creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then if you're in your third act, those creatures gain haste until end of turn.
Exile Deus Ex Machina.
